column4: In one project source code, there is one file with LGPL licence. But that project holder issued Apache License 2.0. I want to use the project source code.. Can I use it ?
why not ask to the project owner only?
posted message 3 months back.. still waiting :(
this is ubuntu support channel. we cant help you further you need to talk to the project owner or talk to one with good knowledge of law and gpl/lgpl
